data.title: The first capital of the Bahamani Kingdom was
data.meta_description: Click here:point_up_2:to get an answer to your question :writing_hand:the first capital of the bahamani kingdom was
data.text:
Solution

Verified by Toppr

The Bahmani Kingdom was a Muslim state of the Deccan and it was the first independent Muslim kingdom in South India. The Bahmani capital was Gulbarga between till 1425 and in 1425 it was moved to Muhammadabad (Bidar).
